QuestData.Title: The Consequence of Courage
QuestData.Description:
Thank you for healing me, $n. I hope that we are earning one another's trust.
<Wrathion shudders.>
The Storm-Eater. I have never faced a dragon of such raw elemental power. If there are others like her...
Wait... where is Ebyssian? Did he survive? You must find him!
